Topic.Title: Educational game - sexting and digital relationships

Posts.EditableText:
Thought I'd share a game designed designed to explore the risks and responsibilities of carrying out romantic relationships in the digital world, and how young people can keep themselves safe. It explores concepts such as revenge porn, trust, peer pressure and grooming, whilst providing students with a greater understanding of the law surrounding sexting and what they can do to protect themselves.

It's a commercial product for schools, but might provide some inspiration. 

Best played on a mobile phone, but will run on anything.
